description: The main landing page of the website serves as the gateway to all the primary sections, offering an overview of what the site has to offer. It features an intuitive navigation bar, a prominent search bar, and interactive elements to engage visitors.
practice_features: Navigation bar to access all main sections of the website
Footer with contact information and social media links
additional_features: Interactive elements like sliders for featured content
Animations and transitions for a modern look and feel

description: This page provides comprehensive information about the organization, including its history, mission, vision, values, and team. It aims to establish trust and credibility with visitors by offering in-depth insights into the organization's background and goals.
practice_features: Images and videos depicting the organization
Interactive timeline of the organization's history
additional_features: Live chat support for immediate assistance

description: This page provides an in-depth overview of the various research areas within the organization. Each area is described in detail, showcasing the scope, objectives, and key projects. Users can navigate to specific research areas to learn more about ongoing projects, key researchers, and recent publications.
practice_features: Overview of research areas with detailed descriptions
additional_features: Search functionality to find specific research topics

description: This page outlines various collaboration opportunities and details about ongoing collaborative projects. It serves as a comprehensive guide for potential partners, providing insights into how to engage in collaborative efforts, current projects, and key contacts.
practice_features: List of current collaborators and projects
Details about different types of collaboration

description: This page details the organization's social responsibility initiatives, showcasing various projects, their impact, and opportunities for community involvement. It aims to highlight the organization's commitment to social causes and provide transparent reporting on their efforts.
practice_features: Interactive project map showing locations of initiatives

description: This page allows users to select their preferred language for the website. It provides options to switch between different languages, ensuring a personalized user experience. Language selection is straightforward, with clear buttons for each available language.
practice_features: Options to change the website language, clear and easy-to-use interface, support for multiple languages.
additional_features: Automatic translation feature, language preference saving for future visits, real-time preview of selected language, tooltips in different languages for better guidance.
